message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?  I'm confident you'll see its true value once you start using it.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $17,000 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I can go. I really need to stay within my budget of $10,000.
